snippet: The Swiss food and drink giant said its underlying sales growth fell to 4.1 percent in the first six months of 2013.
abstract: Nestle reports first-half profit of 5.1 billion Swiss francs, or $5.5 billion, up 3.7 percent from restated 4.9 billion francs in year-ago period; warns that sales will likely fall off due to slowing markets and wary consumers.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss food and drink giant said its underlying sales growth fell to 4.1 percent in the first six months of 2013.

headline.main: Nestlé Posts Rise in Profit, and Warns of Falling Sales
headline.print_headline: Nestlé Posts Rise in Profit, And Warns of Falling Sales
